name: Phaerimm Scout
languages: telepathy 120 ft. understands Common and Deep Speech but can't speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The phaerimm has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The phaerimm makes two attacks, using Stinger or Mindwarp Ray in any combination.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 3}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) Piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Poison damage.

action.name: Mindwarp Ray
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 5}, range 120 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition until the start of the phaerimm's next turn.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: {@actTrigger} The phaerimm is hit by an attack roll. {@actResponse} The phaerimm halves the damage (round down) it takes from that attack.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The phaerimm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):
